CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 6, 1953, pg. 27, reads: "First Pitch - Howard C. McKinney, director of Hill City, was on hand at Kennard Field last Friday evening for the opening of the Uptown Little League. Mr. McKinney, an ardent sports fan, had the honor of tossing out the first ball.  From his form it appears as though he knows his way around a baseball diamond, too. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Hill City director Howard C. McKinney posed throwing out first pitch at Uptown Little League baseball opening day ceremonies, Kennard Field
